episodes.synopsis: Surprises abound as the zany and lovable DreamWorks characters take you on four spirited holiday adventures to remember!
episodes.title: Play All Four: DreamWorks Holiday Classics

episodes.synopsis: When Santa and his reindeer crash on the island of Madagascar, it's up to Alex, Marty, Gloria, Melman and those wacky penguins to save Christmas.
episodes.title: Merry Madagascar

episodes.synopsis: Hiccup and Toothless (from How to Train Your Dragon) take flight in a thrilling adventure to discover an island of never-before-seen dragons.
episodes.title: Dragons: Gift of the Night Fury

episodes.synopsis: Deck the halls with laughter as Donkey presents his very own Christmas caroling stage show, featuring his merry Far Far Away pals.
episodes.title: Donkey's Caroling Christmas-tacular

episodes.synopsis: When a penguin goes to the city for some last-minute Christmas shopping, he gets stuffed into a stocking. It's up to his fellow penguins to save him!
episodes.title: The Madagascar Penguins in a Christmas Caper

video.title: DreamWorks Holiday Classics
video.synopsis: Join your DreamWorks friends for these four holiday specials, featuring Shrek and Donkey, Hiccup and Toothless, and the wacky animals from Madagascar.
